meta.title: GoodFood | Meal Plan Delivery in Tbilisi, Georgia
meta.description: GoodFood offers daily healthy meal plans delivered on subscription in Tbilisi. Home delivery of food the next morning. Order your meal plan now!

item1.title: Convenient Delivery
item1.description: Next Morning Food at Your Door

sectionWhereWeCook.title: Where We Cook
sectionWhereWeCook.subtitle: Our Kitchen: Cleanliness and Food Safety
sectionWhereWeCook.description1: Industrial Kitchen in Tbilisi Center. 200kg food prepared daily. Fresh due to daily supplies, strict hygiene standards.
sectionWhereWeCook.description2: You will be impressed by how we cook!

sectionLocation.title: Delivery Map
sectionLocation.subtitle: Free Delivery in Tbilisi
sectionLocation.description2: – Own delivery service - Express delivery: we will deliver within the chosen time frame - In Tbilisi and +20km - If ordered by 12:00, we will deliver it tomorrow!

sectionFeatures2.title: Our Advantages
sectionFeatures2.item4: We cook and package with love.

sectionFooter.aboutDescription: About GoodFood: We prepare and deliver balanced meal plans to your home. Our aim is to provide tasty and healthy food designed to meet our client's needs for the whole day, week, or month. We create a diverse menu of complete breakfasts, lunches, and dinners to help our clients achieve their goals.
sectionFooter.where_to_buy_description: Purchase Good Food's ready-to-eat meal plans currently available in Tbilisi and surrounding areas. Delivered by our company the next day.
sectionFooter.where_to_buy_description2: Place Your Order and Save Up to 20 Hours a Week!
